1OM.F.summary: Mekonomen AB (publ) operates a chain of car service stores in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Poland, and Finland. It provides spare parts, consumables, and tools, as well as workshop services under the ProMeister brand; and car accessories under the Carwise brand. The company offers a range of solutions and products for the consumers and companies through its stores, affiliated workshops, and wholesale operations. It operates 460 stores; and 3,600 affiliated workshops under the AutoMester, AlltiBil, BilXtra, CarPeople, Din Bilpartner, Hella Servicepartner, Inter Data Service, MECA Car Service, Mekonomen Bilverkstad, MekoPartner, O.K. Serwis, and Speedy brands. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

29B.F.summary: Bufab AB (publ) operates as a trading company that provides solutions for sourcing, quality control, and logistics for C-parts in Sweden and internationally. It offers metal or plastic fasteners, such as screws, bolts, nuts, rivets, pins, washers, etc.; and other small metal, rubber, or plastic parts, including cables, springs, and electronic fasteners. The company also provides stainless steel bolts under the BUMAX brand name; and special products, such as access hardware, cold formed parts, die cast parts, electrical products, machined parts, magnets, plastic parts, rubber parts, stamping and pressing parts, tools and equipment, and turned parts. In addition, it offers assembled parts, add on products, and special packaging and kitting solutions. Further, the company provides supply chain services. It serves customers in a range pf manufacturing industries, including the technology, electronics/telecommunications, consumer goods, transportation and construction, furniture, and automotive sectors, as well as the offshore and refining industry. The company was formerly known as Bufab Holding AB (publ) and changed its name to Bufab AB (publ) in June 2015. Bufab AB (publ) was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in VÃ¤rnamo, Sweden.

ADDT-B.ST.summary: Addtech AB (publ.) operates as a technology trading company in Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Norway, and internationally. The company's Automation segment markets and sells intelligent solutions, subsystems, and components to industrial automation and infrastructure sector, including solutions for robotics, control systems, sensors, and industrial and communication networks; and designs and manufactures equipment for pharmaceutical and diagnostic industries. Its Components segment markets and sells components, sub-systems, and equipment and advanced process systems for mechanics, electromechanics, hydraulics, electronics, and chemical and pharmaceutical applications. The company's Energy segment markets and sells electricity transmission and distribution products, and products in the areas of electrical safety, electrical installation, and connection technology primarily for the energy and electrical installation market through specifiers and electricity wholesalers; and supplies special cables and cable accessories for industrial and mining applications. Its Industrial Process segment markets and sells solutions, sub-systems, and components for the manufacturing and processing industries, as well as manufactures customized gaskets and seals; and supplies products and technical solutions for power transmission and conveyor applications, as well as flue gas purification and heat recovery systems. The company's Power Solutions segment develops, markets, and sells components and system solutions that enable power supply, as well as operates and controls movements or energy flows, such as battery solutions and products used in the interaction between humans and machines; and supplies seats and peripheral components for machines, buses, and trains. Its Power Solutions segment serves customers in the fields of special vehicles, telecoms, environmental technology, and medical technology. The company was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

I1M.F.summary: Indutrade AB (publ) markets and sells components, systems, and services to various industries worldwide. The company operates through eight business areas: Benelux, DACH, Finland, Flow Technology, Fluids & Mechanical Solutions, Industrial Components, Measurement & Sensor Technology, and UK. It is involved in the sale of components, as well as the customization, combination, and installation of products from various suppliers. The company also provides components and systems for controlling, measuring, monitoring, and regulating flows, as well as for industrial production and maintenance; hydraulic and mechanical components; and medical technology equipment. In addition, it offers measurement instruments, measurement systems, sensors, control and regulating technology, and monitoring equipment; and custom-manufactured niche products, design solutions, aftermarket and assembly services, and customization services. Further, the company provides valves, hydraulic and industrial equipment, measurement and process technology, automation products, construction materials, service, filters, pipes and pipe systems, auto repair, tools and transmission, industrial springs, water and wastewater, lighting, chemical technology, fasteners, electronics, vehicles, energy, springs, piston rings, press work, and valve channels. Indutrade AB (publ) was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

INISS-B.ST.summary: Inission AB (publ) provides production and logistics services in the field of industrial electronics in Sweden. The company offers development, sourcing, manufacturing, logistics, and life cycle guarantee services for medical technology, automotive, measuring instruments, telecommunications, marine, and control technology industries. Inission AB (publ) was founded in 1973 and is based in Karlstad, Sweden.

It provides spare parts, consumables, and tools, as well as workshop services under the ProMeister brand; and car accessories under the Carwise brand. The company offers a range of solutions and products for the consumers and companies through its stores, affiliated workshops, and wholesale operations. It operates 460 stores; and 3,600 affiliated workshops under the AutoMester, AlltiBil, BilXtra, CarPeople, Din Bilpartner, Hella Servicepartner, Inter Data Service, MECA Car Service, Mekonomen Bilverkstad, MekoPartner, O.K. Serwis, and Speedy brands. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

MMGR-B.ST.summary: Momentum Group AB (publ) supplies industrial consumables and components; and relates services to professional end users in the industrial and construction sectors in the Nordic region and internationally. The company operates through Tools & Consumables and Components & Services segments. It offers hand tools, machinery, workwear, personal protective equipment, fastening elements, and workplace equipment; and spare parts for customers' production equipment, including bearings, seals, transmission, and automation products. The company also provides workwear, protective footwear, profile clothing, and promotional products. In addition, it offers related services, such as inventory optimization, maintenance planning, repair, training, layout, advisory, set-up, consulting, permit control and monitoring, and standby services, as well as logistics solutions. The company sells its products through a network of approximately 160 local sales units in Sweden, Norway, and Finland, as well as online. It serves customers in the industrial, civil engineering, construction, and public sectors; warehouses and engineering businesses; and process and manufacturing companies, including paper and pulp, sawmill, automotive, food, mining, and engineering companies. Momentum Group AB (publ) was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

TEQ.ST.summary: Teqnion AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, engages in marketing and selling components, machines, systems, and services. The company offers industrial components and engineering products, such as RFID- and Ex-solutions, sensor technology, connectors, solenoids, and breaks and clutches for telecom, process, automation, medicine technology, and packing and labeling industries. It also provides energy systems, such as stirling generators, heat production systems, inverters, batteries and chargers, UPS, lightning protection equipment, earthing material, and equipotential systems for electricians, wind power projects, service vehicle production, shipyards, weather stations, houses, military hospitals, and rescue equipment markets. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.
